question: In order to facilitate the life of students at the university and their movements to and from the university at lectures’ times, especially for the residences located far from the university, we kindly ask you to fill in the form below to count the number of students residing in the following residences: Melana Apartments, Melawis Apartments, Desa Skudai Apartments, The Garden Residences.
answer: Based on the number, arrangements will be made with the university authorities to provide buses that pass to / from the aforementioned residences during lecture times. *Note: This form is for all UTM students who live in these residences, no matter local or international he/she is.* https://forms.gle/hp5XG9usb2yT54n28

question: Jabil is hiring (https://www.jabil.com/). Refer attached excel file on the available position in Jabil, Penang. Interested candidate may get them to send their resume/CV and cover letter to the following email address: Careers GBC careers_gbc@jabil.com
answer: Meanwhile, please name the email title as below (either one): Applying for Intern from UTM, Applying for Fresh Grad from UTM, Applying for Alumni from UTM. In this case, our team could take the prompt action towards it. Thanks! Looking forward to hearing from you!

topic: Registering for a Minor at UTM
question: كيف الواحد يسجل في minor
answer: تواصل بالكلية الي تبغى تسجل فيها وعبي استمارة الماينر
